comprehensive_overview: Plotly.py is an open-source Python graphing library that makes interactive, publication-quality graphs online. It allows users to create interactive plots and dashboards using Python, with a high degree of customization and interactivity.
core_features: Support for various plot types like scatter plots, line charts, bar charts, and more
Ability to create dashboards and web-based visualizations
Integration with Jupyter notebooks for interactive data visualization
